## IResult.orDefault() method

Gets the value associated with a successful [result](./ts-utils.iresult.md)<!-- -->, or a default value if the corresponding operation failed.

**Signature:**

```typescript
orDefault(dflt: T): T;
```

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

dflt


</td><td>

T


</td><td>

The value to be returned if the operation failed.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

T

The return value, if the operation was successful. Returns the supplied default if an error occurred.
